title: Riot can i please have one more chance
body: my account was everything to me and i loved playing leauge and it got banned because one day i play against a better player and he killed me a lot and i was trying i didn't give up but i was a little bit salty because my team was flaming me but that was in defiance i would mean so much to me if i had one more chance on my account i dont care if yous chat restrict me or anything i just really really need my account i put alot of money in that and i promise i will not be salty if it gets banned again i will not complain.  i do not plan on being salty or swearing at my team. just one more chance please riot please...
